name: Password Depot Portable File
summary: Learn about .PSWX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create a PSWX file in Password Depot 6, select the Tools application tab and then choose Export â†’ Export to PSWX.

description: File created by Password Depot, a password organizer for Windows, Android, and iOS; saves all password information in a portable XML format, but still encrypts the sensitive information with a master password; allows data to be transferred between the Windows and mobile versions of the software.
